name: The Haggler: ALTER Reverb Again Demo
name_original: The Haggler: ALTER Reverb Again Demo
description:
The Haggler: ALTER Reverb Again is a retelling of the original Haggler story from the perspective of the mysterious Black Market Man. 

Click or enter to advance dialogue. Click to select a choice. Other instructions in game.

MUSIC CREDITS:

"Balloon Game", "Cold Sober", "Discovery Hit", "March of the Spoons", "Some Amount of Evil", "Thinking Music"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
